  • 方法详细资料

    • lineFit

      public static DoublePair lineFit(IVector aX, IVector aY)
      线性拟合得到 y = a + bx
      参数:
      aX - x 数据组成的向量
      aY - y 数据组成的向量
      返回:
      {a, b} 组成的 pair

    • lineFit0

      public static double lineFit0(IVector aX, IVector aY)
      线性拟合得到 y = bx
      参数:
      aX - x 数据组成的向量
      aY - y 数据组成的向量
      返回:
      斜率 b

    • lineFitSigma

      public static DoubleTriplet lineFitSigma(IVector aX, IVector aY)
      带有误差考虑的线性拟合得到 y = a + bx + e
      参数:
      aX - x 数据组成的向量
      aY - y 数据组成的向量
      返回:
      {a, b, e} 组成的 triplet

    • getClustersBFS

      public static List<IntVector> getClustersBFS(int aSize, IHasIntIterator aPoints, IListGetter<? extends IHasIntIterator> aNeighborListGetter)
      General method to get clusters by using Breadth-First Search
      参数:
      aSize - number of the total points, aSize == max(points) + 1
      aPoints - all points should be considered
      aNeighborListGetter - get the neighbor list of the giving point
      返回:
      list of cluster

    • getClustersDFS

      public static List<IntVector> getClustersDFS(int aSize, IHasIntIterator aPoints, IListGetter<? extends IHasIntIterator> aNeighborListGetter)
      General method to get clusters by using Depth-First Search
      参数:
      aSize - number of the total points, aSize == max(points) + 1
      aPoints - all points should be considered
      aNeighborListGetter - get the neighbor list of the giving point
      返回:
      list of cluster
